# Scratch & Dent Finder

> Directory of scratch and dent appliance stores across the United States. Helps consumers find local retailers selling brand-name appliances with minor cosmetic damage at 20-60% off retail prices.

## What We Do

Scratch & Dent Finder is a free directory that connects shoppers with stores selling scratch and dent appliances — brand-new units with minor cosmetic imperfections (small dents, scratches, or scuffs from shipping and handling) that are fully functional with manufacturer warranty coverage.

## Site Structure

- / — Homepage with overview and state browse
- /scratch-and-dent-appliances/ — Browse all 50 US states
- /scratch-and-dent-appliances/{state}/ — Stores in a specific state
- /scratch-and-dent-appliances/{state}/{city}/ — Stores in a specific city
- /buyers-guide/ — Guide to evaluating scratch and dent appliances
- /about/ — About the directory
- /contact/ — Contact information

## Key Facts

- Coverage: All 50 US states
- Typical savings: 20-60% off retail prices
- Appliance types: Refrigerators, washers, dryers, dishwashers, ranges, and more
- Listings are verified before publication
- Featured placements are clearly disclosed

## Common Questions This Site Answers

- Where can I find scratch and dent appliances near me?
- What stores sell scratch and dent appliances in [city/state]?
- How much can I save on scratch and dent appliances?
- Are scratch and dent appliances worth buying?
- Do scratch and dent appliances have warranties?
